description: Didn't take long for Adrian to get out of college, make his way east from California and wind up sharing his considerable assets right in front of our cameras. Like many jocks, this former college basket ball player had a healthy exhibitionist streak and more then his share of check marks in his little black book - which is the only way the words ?little? have any connection to this black guy.Six feet tall with a big thick and long cream-filled chocolate pole to match and the more he showed it off, the harder it got! I wonder if the fabric from his uniform jersey rubbed his nipple rings as he played the game. That would explain not just the way he tugged on them while he stoked that big pole, but his tales from locker room showers as well.He is definitely a man of action and when it came time sink the basket, he made a power shot from those bug brown eggs that arced right to center court for a slam dunk spunk.
title: Milk Chocolate, Scene #02
